API docs by Redocly

Authentication Service API (1.0.0)

Download OpenAPI specification:

URL: https://github.com/alexgrauroca License: MIT

API documentation for the authentication service.

This service provides endpoints for customer and staff registration and authentication.

Customers

Operations related to customer registration and authentication

Register a new customer

Creates a new customer account with the provided information

Request Body schema: application/json
required
customer_id
required
string^[0-9a-fA-F]{24}$

Unique customer identifier

email
required
string <email> ^[\w\.-]+@[\w\.-]+\.\w{2,}$

Customer's email address

password
required
string <password> >= 8 characters

Password must be at least 8 characters long

name
required
string [ 1 .. 100 ] characters

Customer's full name

Responses

Local server

http://localhost:80/v1.0/customers/register

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "customer_id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "password": "strongpassword123",
  • "name": "John Doe"
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
  • 409
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "id": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "name": "John Doe",
  • "created_at": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z"
}

Login as a customer

Authenticates a customer and returns access and refresh tokens

Request Body schema: application/json
required
email
required
string <email>

Customer's email address

password
required
string <password> >= 8 characters

Customer's password

Responses

Local server

http://localhost:80/v1.0/customers/login

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "password": "strongpassword123"
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
  • "refresh_token": "dGhpc2lzYXJlZnJlc2h0b2tlbg==",
  • "expires_in": 3600,
  • "token_type": "Bearer"
}

Refresh access token

Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token

Authorizations:
BearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
access_token
required
string non-empty

The expired JWT access token

refresh_token
required
string non-empty

The refresh token to use

Responses

Local server

http://localhost:80/v1.0/customers/refresh

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
  • "refresh_token": "dGhpc2lzYXJlZnJlc2h0b2tlbg=="
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 401
  • 403
  • 500
Content type
application/json
{
  • "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
  • "refresh_token": "dGhpc2lzYXJlZnJlc2h0b2tlbg==",
  • "expires_in": 3600,
  • "token_type": "Bearer"
}
